participant_1.background:
I loved reading books as a child, and I would often spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.
I like to watch thrillers because they keep me on the edge of my seat.
i help my neighbor.
I love to travel and explore, but I always make sure to spend time with my family, too.
i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.

participant_2.background:
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.

content.text: I love to read. When I was younger I would spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.
I used to read a lot when I was younger too. It was really relaxing. What do you like to read?
I love to read sci fi space adventures. They are so exciting and keep me on the edge of my seat.
That sounds really cool. I've never read a sci fi space adventure book before. What are some of your favorites?
I really enjoyed the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card. And I also liked the Martian by Andy Weir.
Those sound like really good books. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're really fun to read.
I'm glad to hear you enjoyed them. I've always been meaning to read more, but I never seem to have the time.
I know what you mean. I wish I had more time to read too.
Maybe we can start a book club. We could read books together and discuss them.
That's a great idea! I'd love to do that.
Awesome! We can start by picking a book and then we can set up a time to discuss it.
Sounds good to me. I'm excited to get started
